column4: i dont know how to install adobe flash player :( just tried to enter into youtube (i'm new at ubuntu) and it said i needed to download adobe flash player and it makes me choose the type of file that i need to download and dont know how to install it, does any1 know how to?
is it a .deb file that you downloaded?
I agree with santiago do it through synaptic package manager (in System > Admin )
make sure you dont have 453543 package managers opened...one at a time :)
oh ok I will from now on :)
it depends on you I guess, didnt take too long to me
not for now :D, but i'm sure there will be
how do i get other gnome themes and then how do i change them?
I suggest you to watch this : http://fr.youtube.com/watch?v=jmA0VMd0w1E
that might help , you can still ask questions after (if I am not in bed :p )
